trans-unit.source: Supplies location data that is based on latitude and longitude coordinates.
trans-unit.target: As coordenadas de dados de localização de fontes baseia-se no latitude e longitude.

trans-unit.source: The GeoCoordinateWatcher class supplies coordinate-based location data from the current location provider.
trans-unit.target: A classe de GeoCoordinateWatcher fornece dados de localização baseada em coordenadas do fornecedor de localização atual.

trans-unit.source: The current location provider is prioritized as the highest on the computer, based on a number of factors, such as the age and accuracy of the data from all providers, the accuracy requested by location applications, and the power consumption and performance impact associated with the location provider.
trans-unit.target: O fornecedor de localização atual está definido como a mais elevada no computador, com base num número de fatores, tais como a idade e a precisão dos dados de todos os fornecedores, a precisão solicitada por aplicações de localização e o impacto de desempenho e o consumo de energia associado ao fornecedor de localização.

trans-unit.source: The current location provider might change over time, for instance, when a GPS device loses its satellite signal indoors and a Wi-Fi triangulation provider becomes the most accurate provider on the computer.
trans-unit.target: Poderá alterar o fornecedor de localização atual ao longo do tempo, por exemplo, quando um dispositivo GPS perde o sinal satélite indoors e um fornecedor de triangulation Wi-Fi torna-se o fornecedor mais exato no computador.

trans-unit.source: To begin accessing location data, create a GeoCoordinateWatcher and call <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A> or <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.TryStart%2A> to initiate the acquisition of data from the current location provider.
trans-unit.target: Para começar a aceder aos dados de localização, criar um GeoCoordinateWatcher e chamada <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A>ou <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.TryStart%2A>para iniciar a aquisição de dados do fornecedor de localização atual.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.TryStart%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property can be checked to determine if data is available.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>propriedade pode ser verificada para determinar se os dados estão disponíveis.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>

trans-unit.source: If data is available, you can get the location one time from the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> property, or receive continuous location updates by handling the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Se os dados estão disponíveis, pode obter a localização de uma vez a partir de <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>propriedade, ou de receber atualizações de localização contínua ao processar o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Permission%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>, and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> properties support <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>, so that an application can data-bind to these properties.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Permission%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>, e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>Propriedades suporte <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>, para que uma aplicação pode-enlace de dados com estas propriedades.</xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Permission%2A>

trans-unit.source: In Windows 7, all the <xref:System.Device.Location> classes are fully functional if a location provider is installed and able to resolve the computer's location.
trans-unit.target: No Windows 7, todos os o <xref:System.Device.Location>classes são totalmente funcionais se está instalado um fornecedor de localização e possível resolver a localização do computador.</xref:System.Device.Location>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > On Windows 7 Starter Edition, the only supported location provider is the Default Location Provider in Control Panel, and an add-in must be installed to specify latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > No Windows 7 de arranque de edição, o fornecedor de localização suportada apenas for o fornecedor de localização predefinida, no painel de controlo e um suplemento tem de estar instalado para especificar a latitude e longitude.

trans-unit.source: **Note** In versions of Windows prior to Windows 7, the following conditions apply: - All <xref:System.Device.Location> objects that have constructors can be created, but the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property will always have the value <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus>.
trans-unit.target: **Tenha em atenção** nas versões do Windows anterior ao Windows 7, são aplicáveis as seguintes condições:-todos os <xref:System.Device.Location>objetos que tenham construtores podem ser criados, mas a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>propriedade terão sempre o valor <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location>

trans-unit.source: - The location indicated by the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> property of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> will always be <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: -A localização indicada pela <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>será sempre <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: - No location events will be raised.
trans-unit.target: -Serão desencadeados não existem eventos de localização.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref> with default accuracy settings.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref> com predefinições de precisão.

trans-unit.source: The default accuracy setting is <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição precisão é <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy>

trans-unit.source: **Note** In versions of Windows prior to Windows 7, the following conditions apply: - All <xref:System.Device.Location> objects that have constructors can be created, but the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property will always have the value <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus>.
trans-unit.target: **Tenha em atenção** nas versões do Windows anterior ao Windows 7, são aplicáveis as seguintes condições:-todos os <xref:System.Device.Location>objetos que tenham construtores podem ser criados, mas a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>propriedade terão sempre o valor <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location>

trans-unit.source: - The location indicated by the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> property of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> will always be <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: -A localização indicada pela <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>será sempre <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: - No location events will be raised.
trans-unit.target: -Serão desencadeados não existem eventos de localização.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref>, given an accuracy level.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref>, atribuído um nível de precisão.

trans-unit.source: **Note** In versions of Windows prior to Windows 7, the following conditions apply: - All <xref:System.Device.Location> objects that have constructors can be created, but the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property will always have the value <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus>.
trans-unit.target: **Tenha em atenção** nas versões do Windows anterior ao Windows 7, são aplicáveis as seguintes condições:-todos os <xref:System.Device.Location>objetos que tenham construtores podem ser criados, mas a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>propriedade terão sempre o valor <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location>

trans-unit.source: - The location indicated by the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> property of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> will always be <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: -A localização indicada pela <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>será sempre <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: - No location events will be raised.
trans-unit.target: -Serão desencadeados não existem eventos de localização.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationAccuracy> that indicates the requested accuracy level of the location provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationAccuracy>que indica o nível de precisão solicitada do fornecedor de localização.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationAccuracy>

trans-unit.source: An accuracy of <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy"></xref> can degrade performance and should be specified only when high accuracy is needed.
trans-unit.target: A precisão das <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy"> </xref> pode degradar o desempenho e deve ser especificado apenas quando é necessário precisão alta.

trans-unit.source: The requested accuracy level for the location data that is provided by the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nível de precisão pedida para os dados de localização fornecida pelo <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An accuracy of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy> can degrade performance and should be specified only when high accuracy is needed.
trans-unit.target: A precisão das <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy>pode degradar o desempenho e deve ser especificado apenas quando é necessário precisão alta.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy>

trans-unit.source: **Note** In versions of Windows prior to Windows 7, the following conditions apply: - All <xref:System.Device.Location> objects that have constructors can be created, but the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property will always have the value <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus>.
trans-unit.target: **Tenha em atenção** nas versões do Windows anterior ao Windows 7, são aplicáveis as seguintes condições:-todos os <xref:System.Device.Location>objetos que tenham construtores podem ser criados, mas a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>propriedade terão sempre o valor <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location>

trans-unit.source: - The location indicated by the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> property of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> will always be <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: -A localização indicada pela <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>será sempre <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: - No location events will be raised.
trans-unit.target: -Serão desencadeados não existem eventos de localização.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy"></xref>, which indicates the requested accuracy level of the location provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy"></xref>, que indica o nível de precisão solicitada do fornecedor de localização.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources that are used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Versões de todos os recursos que são utilizados pela instância atual do <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher> class?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Dispose%2A>Quando tiver terminado com o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher>classe? qualifyHint = False & autoUpgrade = True.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method should be called so that unmanaged resources can be freed.
trans-unit.target: Este método deve ser chamado para que os recursos não geridos podem ser libertados.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [recursos não geridos limpeza](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementar um método eliminar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Versões de todos os recursos utilizados pela instância atual do <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher> class?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Dispose%2A>Quando tiver terminado com o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher>classe? qualifyHint = False & autoUpgrade = True.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method should be called so that unmanaged resources can be freed.
trans-unit.target: Este método deve ser chamado para que os recursos não geridos podem ser libertados.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [recursos não geridos limpeza](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementar um método eliminar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Frees resources and performs other cleanup operations before the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref> is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Liberta recursos e efetuar outras operações de limpeza antes do <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref> é reclamada a recolha de lixo.

trans-unit.source: The distance that must be moved, in meters, relative to the coordinate from the last <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged"></xref> event, before the location provider raises another <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: A distância que têm de ser movida, no medidores, relativos a coordenada dos últimos <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged"> </xref> evento, antes do fornecedor de localização desencadeia outro <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The default movement threshold is zero, which means that any change in location detected by the current location provider causes a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> event and an update in the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O limiar de movimento predefinido for zero, o que significa que qualquer alteração na localização detetada pelas causas de fornecedor de localização atual um <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged>eventos e uma atualização no <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The movement threshold does not guarantee that events will be received at the requested threshold.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O limiar de movimento não garante que eventos serão recebidos com o limiar de pedido.

trans-unit.source: The platform attempts to honor requests for a particular movement threshold, but in some cases, the events will not be raised at the requested threshold.
trans-unit.target: A plataforma tenta honrar pedidos para um limiar de movimento determinado mas, em alguns casos, os eventos não serão gerados com o limiar de pedido.

trans-unit.source: **Note** In versions of Windows prior to Windows 7, the following conditions apply: - All <xref:System.Device.Location> objects that have constructors can be created, but the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property will always have the value <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus>.
trans-unit.target: **Tenha em atenção** nas versões do Windows anterior ao Windows 7, são aplicáveis as seguintes condições:-todos os <xref:System.Device.Location>objetos que tenham construtores podem ser criados, mas a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>propriedade terão sempre o valor <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location>

trans-unit.source: - The location indicated by the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> property of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> will always be <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: -A localização indicada pela <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>será sempre <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: - No location events will be raised.
trans-unit.target: -Serão desencadeados não existem eventos de localização.

trans-unit.source: The following diagram represents location coordinates that the location provider (for example, a GPS device) supplies to the computer.
trans-unit.target: O diagrama seguinte representa as coordenadas de localização que o fornecedor de localização (por exemplo, um dispositivo GPS) fornece ao computador.

trans-unit.source: P1, in the diagram, represents the location data included in a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> event, and P2, P3, and P4 represent points within the movement threshold.
trans-unit.target: P1, no diagrama, representa os dados de localização incluídos num <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged>evento e P2, P3 e P4 representam pontos no limiar movimento.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged>

trans-unit.source: So when the location provider supplies data indicating a location at those points (P1, P2, P3, and P4), no <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> events are raised, and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> returns P1.
trans-unit.target: Assim, quando o fornecedor de localização fornece dados que não indicam uma localização se esses pontos (P1, P2, P3 e P4) <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged>eventos são gerados, e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>devolve P1.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The point P5 is outside of the MovementThreshold distance, so at that point, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationProvider.Location%2A> is updated and a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationProvider.LocationChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: P5 o ponto está fora do distância MovementThreshold, por isso, nessa altura, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationProvider.Location%2A>é atualizada e um <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationProvider.LocationChanged>o evento é gerado.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationProvider.LocationChanged> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationProvider.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram illustrating MovementThreshold](~/add/media/ndp-movementthreshold.png "Diagram illustrating MovementThreshold")
trans-unit.target: ![Diagrama que ilustra MovementThreshold](~/add/media/ndp-movementthreshold.png "diagrama que ilustra MovementThreshold")

trans-unit.source: Distance, in meters.
trans-unit.target: Distância, em medidores.

trans-unit.source: Called when a <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando um <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged"> </xref> evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionChangedEventArgs%601> object that contains the new location.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionChangedEventArgs%601> objeto que contém a nova localização.

trans-unit.source: Called when a <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.StatusChanged"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando um <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.StatusChanged"> </xref> evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatusChangedEventArgs"></xref> object that contains the new status.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatusChangedEventArgs"> </xref> objeto que contém o estado de novo.

trans-unit.source: Called when a property of the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando uma propriedade do <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref> alterações.

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged> event to implement data binding in Windows Forms applications.
trans-unit.target: Processar o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged>eventos de implementar o enlace de dados de aplicações do Windows Forms.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged>

trans-unit.source: This method indicates that the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property, the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> property, or the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Permission%2A> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: Este método indica que o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>propriedade, o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>propriedade, ou o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Permission%2A>propriedade foi alterado.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Permission%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the property that has changed.
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade que foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether permission to access location data from location providers has been granted or denied.
trans-unit.target: Indica se foram concedeu ou negou permissões para aceder a dados de localização de fornecedores de localização.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether permission has been granted or denied.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se foram concedeu ou negou permissão.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> which indicates the current location.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> que indica a localização atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> which indicates the current location.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> que indica a localização atual.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the latitude or longitude of the location data has changed.
trans-unit.target: Indica que a latitude ou longitude dos dados de localização foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: This event is only raised when the distance moved since the last event exceeds the threshold that is specified by <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.MovementThreshold%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este evento apenas é gerado quando a distância movido, uma vez que o último evento excede o limiar especificado pelo <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.MovementThreshold%2A>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.MovementThreshold%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionChangedEventArgs%601> object passed to the event handler includes the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601> object that contains the updated location data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionChangedEventArgs%601>objeto transmitido para o processador de eventos inclui o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601>objeto que contém os dados de localização atualizado.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionChangedEventArgs%601>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Initiate the acquisition of data from the current location provider.
trans-unit.target: Inicie a aquisição de dados do fornecedor de localização atual.

trans-unit.source: This method enables <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged"></xref> events and allows access to the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position*> property.
trans-unit.target: Este método permite <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged"> </xref> eventos e permite o acesso para o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position*>propriedade.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position*>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method will initiate the acquisition of data from the current location provider.
trans-unit.target: Chamar este método irá iniciar a aquisição de dados do fornecedor de localização atual.

trans-unit.source: The current location provider is selected based on factors such as the age and accuracy of the data from all providers, the accuracy requested by the application or applications, and the power consumption and performance impact associated with the location provider.
trans-unit.target: O fornecedor atual de localização é selecionado com base em fatores como a idade e a precisão dos dados de todos os fornecedores, a precisão pedida por aplicação ou aplicações e o consumo de energia e o impacto no desempenho associado ao fornecedor de localização.

trans-unit.source: The current location provider might change over time, for instance, when a GPS device loses its satellite signal indoors and a Wi-Fi triangulation provider becomes the most accurate provider on the computer.
trans-unit.target: Poderá alterar o fornecedor de localização atual ao longo do tempo, por exemplo, quando um dispositivo GPS perde o sinal satélite indoors e um fornecedor de triangulation Wi-Fi torna-se o fornecedor mais exato no computador.

trans-unit.source: If the current prioritized location provider does not have data when the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A> method is called, it will start to acquire data.
trans-unit.target: Se atual definida o fornecedor de localização não tem dados quando o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A>método é denominado, será iniciado ao adquirir dados.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the permissions have been granted to the client when the data becomes available, data can be accessed synchronously, and will be delivered asynchronously if events are being handled.
trans-unit.target: Se foram concedidas as permissões para o cliente quando os dados ficam disponíveis, dados podem ser acedidos de forma síncrona e irão ser entregue no modo assíncrono, se estão a ser processados eventos.

trans-unit.source: If the Windows 7 Sensor and Location platform is disabled when <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A> is called, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A> will immediately return, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> events will not be raised, and the location returned by the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> property of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> will contain <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: Se a plataforma do Windows 7 Sensor e a localização está desativada quando <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A>é chamado <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A>imediatamente devolverá, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged>não serão gerados eventos, e a localização devolvido pela <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>irá conter <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the current prioritized location provider does have data, it will be available synchronously immediately, and will be delivered asynchronously if events are being handled.
trans-unit.target: Se o fornecedor de localização prioritários atual tiver dados, estarão disponível em sincronia imediatamente e irá ser entregue no modo assíncrono, se estão a ser processados eventos.

trans-unit.source: If the calling application does not have permissions to access data from a location provider, the user will be prompted with a dialog box to either grant or deny permission.
trans-unit.target: Se a aplicação de chamada não tiver permissões para aceder a dados a partir de um fornecedor de localização, o utilizador será apresentado uma caixa de diálogo para conceder ou negar permissões.

trans-unit.source: The dialog box will be modeless.
trans-unit.target: Será-se a caixa de diálogo não modal.

trans-unit.source: Initiate the acquisition of data from the current location provider.
trans-unit.target: Inicie a aquisição de dados do fornecedor de localização atual.

trans-unit.source: This method enables <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged"></xref> events and allows access to the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position*> property.
trans-unit.target: Este método permite <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged"> </xref> eventos e permite o acesso para o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position*>propriedade.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to suppress the permission dialog box; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to optionally show the permission dialog box if permissions have not already been granted.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para suprimir a caixa de diálogo permissão; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> opcionalmente Mostrar a caixa de diálogo permissão se não já foram concedidas permissões.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current status of the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado atual do <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus"></xref> which indicates the availability of data from the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus"> </xref> que indica a disponibilidade dos dados a partir de <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the status of the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref> object has changed.
trans-unit.target: Indica que o estado do <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref> objeto foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: The StatusChanged event is raised on the same thread that the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher> object was created on.
trans-unit.target: StatusChanged o evento é gerado no mesmo thread que o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher>objeto foi criado no.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Stops the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref> from providing location data and events.
trans-unit.target: Interrompe a <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref> de responder a eventos e dados de localização.

trans-unit.source: After Stop is called, no further <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> events occur, and the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> property will return <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: Depois de parar é chamado, não mais <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged>eventos ocorrem e a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>propriedade devolverá <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged>

trans-unit.source: When Stop is called, the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationStatus.Disabled>.
trans-unit.target: Quando parar é chamado, a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationStatus.Disabled>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationStatus.Disabled> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initiates the acquisition of data from the current location provider.
trans-unit.target: Inicia a aquisição de dados do fornecedor de localização atual.

trans-unit.source: This method returns synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Este método devolve de forma síncrona.

trans-unit.source: This method blocks execution of the calling thread during the time period specified by `timeout`.
trans-unit.target: Este método bloqueia a execução do thread de chamada durante o período de tempo especificado pelo `timeout`.

trans-unit.source: Use caution when calling TryStart from the user interface thread of your application.
trans-unit.target: Tenha cuidado ao chamar TryStart a partir do thread de interface de utilizador da sua aplicação.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to suppress the permission dialog box; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to display the permission dialog box.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para suprimir a caixa de diálogo permissão; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para apresentar a caixa de diálogo permissão.

trans-unit.source: Time in milliseconds to wait for the location provider to start before timing out.
trans-unit.target: Tempo em milissegundos a aguardar para o fornecedor de localização iniciar antes de exceder o tempo limite.

trans-unit.source: if data acquisition is started within the time period specified by timeout; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se a aquisição de dados é iniciada durante o período de tempo especificado pelo timeout ; caso contrário, .
